pages.text: A guiding principle from before the era of the Order of Druids was that of Pacifism: living within nature and protecting nature's inhabitants, slaying creatures only in defense of oneself and not for food, greed or gain.$(br2)While pacifism is not a requirement of a practitioner of Wild Magic,  $(l:rituals/ritual_animal_harvest)Animal Harvest$() and other rituals and spells empower this lifestyle.

$(o)This optional feature serves no purpose in Roots 3 other than as a way to track whether or not you have 'broken' the pacifist compact. There is currently neither benefit or penalty for receiving the 'Untrue Pacifist' advancement.$()$(br2)$(o)If you desire, the advancement tracking can be disabled in the configuration. On the other hand, CraftTweaker can be used to add additional peaceful creatures asides from those included by default.$()
